mapper.insert: insert into event(num, title, content, writer_num, deadline) values(eve_sequence.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writerNum}, TO_DATE(#{deadline},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))
mapper.update: update event set view_count = view_count+1 where num = #{num}

mapper.delete: delete from event where delete_date+90 <= sysdate
